text: Yevhen Sharonin (born 9 September 1971) is a Ukrainian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Ukraine Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Yevhen Sharonin
